productdata.title: Cetaphil
productdata.details: Pack Of: 1  Quantity: 125 ml Product Type: Skin Cleanser Packaging Type: Plastic Bottle Skin Type: Dry to Normal and Sensitive skin Ideal For-Men & Women Mfg. Lic. No.: M-736  Product Information: Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser is a clinically tested creamy cleansing formula, fortified with Hydrating Glycerin, Vitamin B3 and Pro-Vitamin B5. This cleanser gently removes dirt, makeup and impurities, while preserving the skin's natural moisture barrier. It is ideal for face and body.  Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser defends against 5 signs of skin sensitivity: • Weakened skin moisture barrier • Dryness • Irritation • Roughness • Tightness Ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Pantolactone, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Sodium Benzoate and Citric Acid. Key Benefits: • Removes dirt, makeup and impurities from the skin • Hydrates and replenish the skin's moisture Usage Direction: • Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser is recommended for external use only as advised by the physician. • Direction for use without water: Apply Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser to the skin and massage gently. Remove excess with a soft cloth, leaving a thin transparent film on the skin. • Before application always go through the leaflet or label instructions that come up with the product. Safety Information: If allergic to any ingredients of Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser, let the physician know straight away. • The physician should be well informed when concomitant application of this one with another product.  Storage Condition: • Store below 30°C. • Keep out of reach of children.

productdata.title: Testing kit
productdata.details: The OneTouch ultra test strips are used with the One Touch ultra easy blood glucose monitoring system for the quantitative measurement of glucose (sugar) in fresh capillary whole blood samples drawn from the fingertips. The OneTouch ultra easy blood glucose test strips are intended to be used by a single patient and should not be shared. Features: • Requires only a tiny blood sample. • Automatically draws blood into test strip. Usage Direction:  • OneTouch Ultra Test Strips are intended to be used with OneTouch Ultra glucometer only. • Read package insert before using this product. Safety Information: For single use only.  • Do not use if expiration date has passed. Storage Conditions: • Store at temperatures under 30°C (80°F). Do not refrigerate.  Keep out of children

productdata.title: Herbal
productdata.details: Pack Of-1 Quantity: 1 L  Container Type- Mono Carton  Product type- Herbal Juices  Food Preference - Vegetarian  MFG Lic No-810 AYU E  Product Information-Triphala Juice, tri meaning 'three' and phala meaning 'fruits' is made from three native Indian dried fruits Amla, Bahera, and Haritaki. It was believed that if a vaidya knew how to use Triphala properly, he could heal any disease. Today, Kapiva aims to provide you with all the original benefits of Triphala by using pure, raw herbs (instead of extracts) and not adding any artificial colors or flavors. Kapiva Triphala Juice helps you fight constipation and improve digestion.  Benefits- Kapiva Triphala Juice is an excellent choice for  solving constipation and irregular bowels. The 3 ingredients - Amla, Bahera, Harad are known as natural laxatives that are tridoshic in nature, and help in balancing all the doshas in the body.  Ingredients:- Amla juice 33.20%, Harad Juice 33.20%, Bahera juice 33.20%, Citric Acid (Ph Stabiliser) 0.1%, Permitted Class II Preservatives less than 0.3%  How To Use-  • Shake the boottle before use  • dilute 30 ml of triphala juice with 30 ml of water • Consume at night before meal Benefits- Kapiva Triphala Juice is an excellent choice for solving constipation and irregular bowels. The 3 ingredients - Amla, Bahera, Harad are known as natural laxatives that are tridoshic in nature, and help in balancing all the doshas in the body.  Ingredients:- Amla juice 33.20%, Harad Juice 33.20%, Bahera  juice 33.20%, Citric Acid (Ph Stabiliser) 0.1%, Permitted Class II Preservatives less than 0.3%  How To Use- Shake the boottle before use  • dilute 30 ml of triphala juice with 30 ml of water • Consume at night before meal  Storage Instruction:- Store the Drink in a dry air tight container in a cool dry place after opening the pack

productdata.title: Gel
productdata.details: Pack of -1 Quantity - 100 g Container type - Tube Paraben free - Yes About Ahaglow Skin Rejuvenating Face Wash Gel 100 g: Ahaglow is a dermatologically tested, non-comedogenic, paraben-free skin rejuvenating face wash gel that purifies & refreshes the skin.. Each Ahaglow Skin Rejuvenating Face Wash Gel contains: Purified Water, Acrylate Copolymer, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Aloe Vera, Polysorbate 80, Sodium Cocoyl Apple Amino Acids, Decyl Glucoside, Coloured millicapsules, Glycolic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Vitamin E Acetate and Potassium Hydroxide. Ahaglow Skin Rejuvenating Face Wash Gel cleans deeps down to the skin cleaning pores, removing all the impurities like dust, soot, breakdown, sweat and even makeup previously applied to the skin. It refreshes the skin, enhances the complexion, maintain skin pH, and leaves the skin smooth and soft. Benefits of Ahaglow Skin Rejuvenating Face Wash Gel 100 g: Ahaglow Skin Rejuvenating Face Wash Gel is recommended for various purposes such as: • Rejuvenates the skin by encouraging the shedding of old and dead skin cells • Reduces the number of superficial wrinkles • Improves skin tone and texture Unblocks and cleanses the pores Usage direction of Ahaglow Skin Rejuvenating Face Wash Gel 100 g: • Ahaglow Skin Rejuvenating Face Wash Gel is for external use only. • Squeeze out required quantity of Ahaglow advanced gel on palm & crush millicapsules. Work up lather and massage gently on your wet face and neck with an upward circular motion. Rinse off with clear water and pat your face dry. • Please check the package leaflet or label instruction before application. • Replace the cap tightly closed after each use. Precaution & Related information of Ahaglow Skin Rejuvenating Face Wash Gel 100 g: • If allergic to any component of Ahaglow Skin Rejuvenating Face Wash Gel, inform the physician immediately. • If find any other complication, please consult with physician immediately. • Consult with the physician during pregnancy & lactation. • Avoid contact with eyes, mouth and other mucous membrane to avoid irritation. • This product may increase skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. • Keep out of reach of children.

productdata.title: Tablets
productdata.details: What is Crocin 650 Tablet used for? Crocin 650 is a well-known and widely used medicine for fever and pain relief. It frequently used to treat low and moderate pain conditions such as headaches, toothaches, migraines, menstrual cramps, and sprains. It is a safe drug and can be used to treat conditions where people must take painkillers for a longer time, such as musculoskeletal pain. How should I take Crocin 650 Tablet? Crocin 650 tablets should be taken orally and swallowed with water. Do not crush, cut, or chew the tablet. Swallow it whole. Do not take more than 4000 mg or more than 6 tablets under 24 hours. Do not repeat a dose before 4 hours. Though it is available as a non-prescription medicine, it is best to consult a doctor if you do not feel better within 3 days. How does Crocin 650 Tablet work? Crocin 650 contains paracetamol and belongs to the group of analgesics (painkillers) and antipyretic (fever reducing) medicines. It eases pain and fever by blocking the discharge of specific chemical messengers. It starts working within an hour and the effects last for 4-6 hours. I missed a dose. What should I do? If you miss a dose, take the next dose when you remember. If it's almost time to take your next dose, skip and continue to take the next dose. Do not take 2 doses to make up for the missed dose. I have taken too much. What should I do? Crocin 650 is safe in most cases and is unlikely to cause any harm if you do not take more than 6 tablets or 4000 mg in 24 hrs. Do not repeat a tablet before 4 hours. If you have taken more than your prescribed dose you may experience side effects including severe liver injury. In such cases, call your doctor or rush to a nearby hospital immediately. What are the substances that should be avoided with Crocin 650 Tablet? Crocin 650 should not be taken with other medicines containing paracetamol as it increases the risk of overdosing and resulting liver damage. It is safe to take with most other medicines including antibiotics and other painkillers which do not contain paracetamol. Do not take Crocin 650 tablet if you are taking medicines to treat epilepsy, tuberculosis or blood thinners such as warfarin. It can be safely used by pregnant and breastfeeding women. When should I consult my doctor after starting Crocin 650 Tablet? After taking Crocin 650-650 your symptoms should improve and you should start feeling better. Your doctor may call you for a follow-up visit to ensure that your condition has improved. If you do not notice any improvement with Crocin 650, or if you experience severe side effects, consult your doctor right away.

productdata.details: Surgical rolled bandages are used for different types of cuts, Injuries, wounds etc. Strong and convenient, these medical rolled bandages are used when moderate compression is required. • Used for different types of cuts, injuries, wounds Individually wrapped in paper •Skin friendly and hygienic • Material: 100% Cotton • Width of 4 inches

productdata.title: Tablets
productdata.details: About P 500 mg Tablet: P 500 mg Tablet belongs to the group of mild analgesics (pain killer) and antipyretic (fever-reducing) medicine indicated to ease mild to moderate pain and reduce fever. Each uncoated P 500 mg Tablet contains Paracetamol 500 mg. Paracetamol exerts analgesic and antipyretic effects by peripheral blockage of pain impulse generation and inhibition of the hypothalamic heat-regulating centre, respectively. It also exhibits weak anti-inflammatory activity by the inhibition of prostaglandin synthesis. Use of P 500 mg Tablet: P 500 mg Tablet is used to ease mild to moderate pain and reduce fever. It is also used for the treatment of conditions including headache, migraine, backache, toothache, menstrual pain, musculoskeletal pain, and common colds. Usage Direction of P 500 mg Tablet  P 500 mg Tablet is intended for oral use only, in a dose and direction as advised by the physician. •P 500 mg Tablet is taken whole with the help of water. • Do not crush, chew or break the tablet. • Do not skip or stop the medicine without the physician's advice. • Do not consume more than the recommended dose. • Before consumption, always go through the leaflet or label instructions that come with the product. Precaution & Related information of P 500 mg Tablet: • If hypersensitive or allergic to P 500 mg Tablet, inform the physician immediately. P 500 mg Tablet should not be used with other Paracetamol-containing products. • The Physician should be well informed when concomitant consumption of this tablet with any other medicines or supplements. • Taking more than daily dose may cause serious liver damage or allergic reactions (e.g. swelling of the face, mouth and throat, difficulty in breathing, itching or rash). . Consult with the physician during pregnancy & lactation. Keep out of reach of children. Storage condition of P 500 mg Tablet: • Store at a temperature not exceeding 30°C. Protect from light and moisture.

Product Information - Chicco Disinfectant Multi-Purpose is a highly sanitizing disinfecting liquid, effective against bacteria & fungi, for the microbial decontamination of everything that comes in contact with the infant, both metal & plastic, such as feeding bottles, teats, soothers toys, tableware, gum, massagers, etc. Highly sanitizing disinfecting liquid, effective against bacteria & fungi, for the microbial decontamination of fruits & vegetables. Warning - Keep out of reach of children. Not meant for use on the human body. Directions for Use - Fruits & Vegetables: Dilute at 5% concentration (fill the provided measuring cap up to the dose 2 for each liter of water). Contact Time: 30 minutes, then rinse abundantly with drinking water. Feeding Bottles, teats, soothers, toys & tableware used in neonatal age: Dilute at 2% concentration (fill the provided measuring cap up to dose 1 for each liter of water). Contact time: 60 minutes, leave the previously washed objects immersed for no less than 60 minutes. Remove the objects after having washed your hands. Rinse abundantly with drinking water. Storage Conditions - Store at room temperature.

productdata.title: chewgum
productdata.details: About Nicotex 2 mg Mint Plus Flavour Sugar Free Chewing Gum: Nicotex 2 mg Mint Plus Flavour Sugar Free Chewing Gum is a nicotine gum that helps a smoker to quit smoking in 12 weeks, using the principle of Nicotine Replacement Therapy (NRT). It gradually reduces nicotine intake and helps in letting go of the smoking habit for good. This sugar-free gum has mint plus flavour which gives a great taste. Each gum Contains: Nicotine Polacrilex equivalent to Nicotine: 2 mg Colour: Titanium Dioxide Use of Nicotex 2 mg Mint Plus Flavour Sugar Free Chewing Gum: • Helps control the urge to smoke and manage withdrawal symptoms •Helps to quit smoking in 12 weeks Usage Direction of Nicotex 2 mg Mint Plus Flavour Sugar Free Chewing Gum: • Nicotex 2 mg Mint Plus Flavour Sugar Free Chewing Gum is intended for oral use only, in a dose and direction as advised. • Do not skip or stop the medicine without the healthcare professional's advice • Do not consume more than the recommended quantity • Refer to sample dosage schedule as mentioned in the accompanying leaflet. Precaution & safety Related Information of Nicotex 2 mg Mint Plus Flavour Sugar Free Chewing Gum: • If allergic to any ingredients of Nicotex 2 mg Mint Plus Flavour Sugar Free Chewing Gum, let the healthcare professional know straight away. • If found any other complications, inform the healthcare professional immediately. • The healthcare professional should be well informed when the concomitant consumption of this one with another medicine or supplement. • Consult with the during pregnancy and lactation. • Keep out of reach of children. Storage Condition of Nicotex 2 mg Mint Plus Flavour Sugar Free Chewing Gum: • Store in a cool, dry place. Protect from direct heat and sunlight.

productdata.title: Tablets
productdata.details: About P 500 mg Tablet: P 500 mg Tablet belongs to the group of mild analgesics (pain killer) and antipyretic (fever-reducing) medicine indicated to ease mild to moderate pain and reduce fever. Each uncoated P 500 mg Tablet contains Paracetamol 500 mg. Paracetamol exerts analgesic and antipyretic effects by peripheral blockage of pain impulse generation and inhibition of the hypothalamic heat-regulating centre, respectively. It also exhibits weak anti-inflammatory activity by the inhibition of prostaglandin synthesis. Use of P 500 mg Tablet: P 500 mg Tablet is used to ease mild to moderate pain and reduce fever. It is also used for the treatment of conditions including headache, migraine, backache, toothache, menstrual pain, musculoskeletal pain, and common colds. Usage Direction of P 500 mg Tablet  P 500 mg Tablet is intended for oral use only, in a dose and direction as advised by the physician. •P 500 mg Tablet is taken whole with the help of water. • Do not crush, chew or break the tablet. • Do not skip or stop the medicine without the physician's advice. • Do not consume more than the recommended dose. • Before consumption, always go through the leaflet or label instructions that come with the product. Precaution & Related information of P 500 mg Tablet: • If hypersensitive or allergic to P 500 mg Tablet, inform the physician immediately. P 500 mg Tablet should not be used with other Paracetamol-containing products. • The Physician should be well informed when concomitant consumption of this tablet with any other medicines or supplements. • Taking more than daily dose may cause serious liver damage or allergic reactions (e.g. swelling of the face, mouth and throat, difficulty in breathing, itching or rash). . Consult with the physician during pregnancy & lactation. Keep out of reach of children. Storage condition of P 500 mg Tablet: • Store at a temperature not exceeding 30°C. Protect from light and moisture.

productdata.title: Tablets
productdata.details: What is Shelcal 500 Tablet used for? Shelcal 500 is a calcium and vitamin D3 tablet. It promotes bone health and reduces the risk of fractures in people with low calcium and vitamin D levels. It is used to treat bone diseases such as osteomalacia and osteoporosis, in which the bones become weak and brittle. How should I take Shelcal 500 Tablet? Take Shelcal 500 tablet through your mouth (orally) and swallow it whole with a full glass of water or milk. Do not cut, chew or crush the tablet or it may not provide the desired results. There is no best time to take a Shelcal 500 tablet. Take it at the same time everyday preferably with or after a meal. Take the dose as mentioned by your doctor in the prescription. Do not take more than the prescribed dose or you may experience severe side effects. How does Shelcal 500 Tablet work? Shelcal 500 works by increasing calcium and vitamin D levels in the body and strengthening the bones. It corrects calcium and Vitamin D deficiency in the body and reduces the risk of fractures especially in older men and postmenopausal women suffering from bone diseases like osteoporosis. I missed a dose. What should I do? If you forget to take a dose, take it as soon as you remember. If your next dose is due soon, skip the missed dose and continue with the next dose at the same time. Do not take two doses to compensate for the missed dose. I have taken too much. What should I do? If you have taken more than your prescribed dose you may experience severe side effects. Call your doctor immediately. What are the benefits of Shelcal 500 tablet? Calcium makes up a major part of the bones and is necessary for maintaining bone strength and normal functioning of muscles and nerves. Calcium cannot be produced by the body and must be obtained from the foods you eat. Vitamin D helps the body absorb calcium in the gut. In addition to sunlight exposure, vitamin D is also produced in the body as a result of the foods we eat. With age, calcium and vitamin D deficiencies become more common, resulting in weak and fragile bones prone to fractures. Shelcal 500 helps maintain the body’s calcium and vitamin D levels, thus promoting bone health. It is used to treat bone diseases such as osteomalacia, a condition in which bones become soft, weak and brittle. It can also be used in combination with other medicines to treat osteoporosis in the elderly and in postmenopausal women. When should I consult my doctor after starting Shelcal 500 Tablet? Your doctor will prescribe Shelcal 500 for a set period of time, after which your symptoms should improve and you should start feeling better. After completing the course, your doctor may ask you for a follow-up visit to ensure that your condition has improved. If you do not notice any improvement after the course has finished, or if you experience severe side effects, consult your doctor right away.

productdata.title: Toothpaste
productdata.details: Pack of - 1 Quantity - 40 g Container Type - Mono Carton Product Type - Toothpaste Ideal For - Men & Women Flavour - Mint Product Information - When the protective layer of teeth (enamel) is worn away or gums recede, the dentine underneath may become exposed. When the exposed dentine comes in contact with hot, cold, sweet, or sour food and drinks, it can trigger a short sharp sensation called tooth sensitivity. Sensodyne Fresh mint is a daily fluoride toothpaste that might act rapidly against tooth sensitivity while still providing the benefits of regular paste-like strong teeth and healthy gums. It has a mint flavour that might leave your mouth fresh and clean. With twice daily brushing, you can enjoy your favourite foods and drinks without worrying about sensitive teeth. Key Benefits - Long-lasting care for sensitive teeth. Helps remove plaque build-up. Contains fluoride to protect against cavities. Helps maintain healthy gums. Freshens breath. Directions for Use - Brush twice a day & not more than three times, minimize swallowing & spit out. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Talk to your dentist or doctor as soon as possible if you experience swelling of the mouth or face. Sensitive teeth may indicate an underlying problem that needs prompt care, if symptoms persist or worsen see your dentist. Keep out of reach of children. Not for use by children under 12 years of age, unless on the advice of a dental professional or doctor. Storage Information - Keep it in a cool, dry, dark & hygienic place. Keep it away from direct heat & sunlight.

productdata.title: Gel
productdata.details: Pack Of: 1 Quantity: 12 g Product Type: Antifungal Cream Outer Packaging Type: Mono carton Mfg. Lic. No.: MNB/06/380 Product Information: Itch Guard Plus is a fast-acting new-generation antifungal cream with cooling menthol that provides effective relief from fungal infections of skin such as Jock Itch (Dhobi Itch) and infection between toes and fingers. Problems occur at waist, folds of inner thighs, buttocks and underside of breasts and armpits due to fungal infection facilitated by sweat retention, warmth, humidity and friction. Itch Guard Plus penetrates into outer layer of skin and kills the fungus-causing infection and stops its further spread. Composition: Terbinafine Hydrochloride: 1% w/w, Benzyl Alcohol (As Preservative): 1% w/w, Cream Base q.s. Key Benefits: Provides effective relief from fungal infections of skin Works 4X faster Kills fungus Stops further spread Usage Direction: Itch Guard Plus Cream is intended for external use only as advised by the expert. Method of administration: Clean and dry the affected area thoroughly before application. For topical administration. Apply a thin layer to the affected area. Before application, always go through the leaflet or label instructions that come with the product. Safety Information: If allergic to any ingredients of Itch Guard Plus Cream, let the physician know straight away. The physician should be well informed when the concomitant application of this one with another product. Keep away from the eyes, face and mucous membranes. If symptoms do not improve after 2 weeks seek medical advice. Not recommended for use in children under the age of 12 years. Storage Condition: Store in cool dry place. Protect from light. Keep out of reach of children.
